Title: Tape 2, Side B
Writer: Thomas Higgins (teleplay by), Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Hannah thinks someone is stalking her and sets a trap; Hannah's mother confronts the principal; Clay strikes back at someone who wronged Hannah.
